text: Maven central doesn't have an ant-nodeps for 1.8.2. It seems a trifle odd to remove an artifact at a patch release. I googled in search of an explanation and didn't find one.
creator: bimargulies@gmail.com
mbenson@apache.org
text: This jar has been eliminated and is no longer needed in v1.8.2.

creator: bimargulies@gmail.com
text: Thanks. Of course, I finally found the release note immediately after reading this.
